entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
